snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 504: Sonic Power of Nitro (SAGE2008)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic Power of Nitro - SAGE2008
Credit: Yvar Lukassen (YvarTheCreator - Miyvrey Team)
Release Date: August 17, 2008

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Title&Stuff
01:32 - Snowly Peak Act 1
04:56 - Snowly Peak Act 2
06:50 - Tails Gameplay
10:34 - Knuckles Gameplay
14:04 - Amy Gameplay
16:12 - Miyvrey Gameplay
20:12 - Metal Gameplay
21:07 - Cream Gameplay Brief
21:52 - Time Challenge

(EXTRA)
23:55 - Unfinished Space Zone

NOTES: I can't 100% confirm if this is the 2008 build or not.
But it is the same game for sure.
This mainly consists of two Snow Stage Acts with multiple characters to play.
Including Miyvrey.
Tails and Cream do not however control very well in flight mode.
And there are some odd bugs here or there but it works for the most part... sorta kinda.
There is actually a lot more levels to this game, none that are directly accessible in this build however.
With most Miyvrey titles they of course have timed challenge modes among other.
The general main point of this Demo was to show off the Nitro Boosting or other mechanic which I did not use too much I think...
At times I forgot it existed.

(ISSUES)

1. Character Selection can bug out and give you the incorrect character.
2. Cream's code can conflict with Tails and permanently character swap you.
